name: Introduction to Database Systems
title: MEAS EECS 339-0-20 Introduction to Database Systems
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Students must have completed EECS 214, and either EECS 213 or EECS 205, or have PhD standing in CS to register for this course. Students must also be willing to learn the Java programming language and be comfortable working in a command line interface.

descriptions.name: Overview of Class
descriptions.value: Contact the department for further information
